name: Spooky Speedrun
description:
Spooky Speedrun is a highly challenging 3D-Platformer, where the player has to perform one difficult jump after another in time-based levels, that require perfect timing and execution.
The goal is simple; follow the path of lit up platforms and blocks. Reach the end before time runs out.
The game has no easy-mode or upgrade abilities, you’ll have to rely on pure skill. Are you up for the challenge?


Collect medals by beating your highscore and completing challenges.
